Quick Translate XD 
A lightweight language translation tool. Use Microsoft translate service to translate between language pairs. 
 
Features: 
- 50+ language translation. 
- Provide From/To language switch function. 
- Provide Share function (you can share translated text to Twitter, Facebook, email, SMS..etc) 
- Search translated text into preferred search engine 

To better improve this app, we use Google Analysis to collect user's activity anonymously.
